EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification to Partner upon a Partner Deal Opportunity being Won
EmailTemplate.name: PRM Email Notification to Partner upon a Partner Deal Opportunity being Won
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name}- Update : Congrats Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Partner_Sub_Agent_Contact__c},
Congratulations! Your opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} has Closed Won. Next steps: You will receive a signed copy of the executed contract.
Thanks, Channel Support
